title: Windows 11
content: Windows 11, the latest version of Microsoft's computer operating system, launches worldwide on Tuesday as a free upgrade for Windows 10 users.

title: Quantum Physics
content: Scientists are one step closer to error-correcting quantum computers. Multiple quantum bits were combined into one ‘logical qubit’ to detect mistakes.

title: Art in America
content: Guadalupe Maravilla wins $100,000 Lise Wilhelmsen Award, one of the world’s largest art prizes.

title: Twitch
content: Data Breach: Documents shared in online forums appear to show records of payments made to streamers.

title: Health & Medicine
content: A new antiviral pill cuts COVID-19 hospitalization and death rates. Merck says its drug, molnupiravir, stops viral replication and can be taken right after a COVID-19 diagnosis.

title: Auctions
content: Botticelli ‘Man of Sorrows’ expected to fetch $40M. Following the record-setting $92 million sale of a Sandro Botticelli painting last year, Sotheby’s is bringing another 15th-century portrait by the Renaissance artist to the auction block.

title: Facebook
content: Facebook has apologised after it stopped working for users around the world for several hours.

title: Chemistry
content: Chemists Benjamin List and David MacMillan have sparked a whole new field that’s aided drug discovery and made chemistry more environmentally friendly.

title: Creative Economy
content: If passed, Bipartisan bill offers $300 M. in grants for artists and public arts programming.
